Issue.creator: icarrascol
Issue.summary: Discovery failed constructing descriptor for chaincode using private collections
Issue.description: " {code} i dont know what it means but i think it cant build the endorsing plan or something related? as an alternative i tried passing manually the peers that should endorse the transaction (1 peer from org1 and 1 peer from org3) and it worked. if i change all the AND to OR i dont get the error. considering that if i pass the peers manually the invoke succeded i think there is something wrong with the sdk. >
